Text:
Be careful, everyone.
A lot of fakes coming out with this title.
They all claim it's this movie
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2381962/

But, so far, they all turn out to be this  movie http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2415464/

yep...another fake.
don't waste your time

It's a fake definitely a fake. Great quality picture and audio though. Aside from it not being the movie you think it is, its a decent download, but I don't think I'd have wanted to waste the bandwidth on it. This is the movie your downloading...

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hansel_%26_Gretel_(2013_film)
Genuine. I actually downloaded and played it. 720p, AC3 audio, no subs.

To clarify, this torrent is the 2013 Hansel & Gretel, directed by Athony C. Ferrante, and starring Dee Wallace as Lilith.
It is not the 2012 Hansel and Gretel, directed by 
David DeCoteau, starring Booboo Stewart.

To clarify, this is the 2013 Hansel & Gretel, directed by Anthony C. Ferrante.
It is NOT the 2013 Hansel and Gretel, directed by David DeCoteau.
It is NOT the 2013 Hansel and Gretel Witch Hunters, directed by  Tommy Wirkola.

just how fuckin' stupid do you have to be to call this movie a FAKE? it's like calling vanilla icecream fake chocolate icecream.

it's simply a so called MOCKBUSTER by those assholes at THE ASYLUM. i think PB should do a seperate category called "the asylum movies"
